product_desc:
Our platform addresses the common challenges faced by families and family offices by providing an integrated access point to people, services, and information. We support the operations and professional service teams that support families across the planet.

We currently are developing the following applications:

Portal - Seamlessly launch all services that your family office depends upon. Communicate fluently and securely with teams, vendors, projects and assets. Find, organize and reference the files that drive your enterprise.

Spotless - Photo based house cleaning checklists. Support house cleaning across multiple properties and teams: shortening initial instruction, eliminating redundancy and targeting problem areas.

Fix It - Responsive maintenance support. Report, triage and fix anything that's broken within the estate.

Greenlight - Easy to use financial controls and auditing. Approve, Deny or Question expenditures, investments or critical decisions.
high_concept: One source for family information and services
name: Way2B1
